metadata.title: CVE-2017-18018 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In GNU Coreutils through 8.29, chown-core.c in chown and chgrp does notprevent replacement of a plain file with a symlink during use of the POSIX"-R -L" options, which allows local users to modify the ownership ofarbitrary files by leveraging a race condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

coreutils - 8.30-3ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: coreutils package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.30-3ubuntu2').
